text: Manuel Oltra i Ferrer (8 February 1922 - 26 September 2015) was a Spanish composer. He was known for composing music about harmony and counterpoint music. He led the Conservatorio Superior Municipal de Barcelona from 1959 until its disestablishment in 1987. Oltra was born in Valencia, Spain. Oltra died of pneumonia in Barcelona, Spain at the age of 93.Muere el compositor de sardanas Manuel Oltra ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography Category:1922 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Spain Category:People from Valencia Category:Spanish composers
title: Manuel Oltra
